remarks: A condition for a relation to be a direction.  (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 25-Nov-2009.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 22-Nov-2013.)
statement:
isdir.1 $e |- A = U. U. R $.
isdir $p |- ( R e. V -> ( R e. DirRel <-> ( ( Rel R /\ ( _I |` A ) C_ R ) /\ ( ( R o. R ) C_ R /\ ( A X. A ) C_ ( `' R o. R ) ) ) ) ) $.
